sentences.en: A death in the family put a damper on our Christmas celebrations.
sentences.cn: 家中的丧事使我们的圣诞庆祝会变得令人扫兴.

sentences.en: An ER damper for controlling machine chatter is developed.
sentences.cn: 研究开发了一种控制机床颤振的电流变减振器.

sentences.en: Back damper for registering position of board width is manual adjustment.
sentences.cn: 定位纸宽的后挡板手动式调整.

sentences.en: he put a damper on her youthful excitement.
sentences.cn: 他压制了她青春的激情。

sentences.en: Keywords: electrorheological fluid, flow mode, mixed mode, shear mode, damper.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 电流变液 、 流动模式 、 混合模式 、 剪切模式 、 阻尼器.

sentences.en: Let us now consider the damper attached to the mass of FigureF 2.
sentences.cn: 现在我们考虑连在图F2的质量上的制动器.

sentences.en: MR damper is one of the most excellent semi - active control devices.
sentences.cn: 磁流变液(MR)阻尼器就是其中一种优秀的 半主动 控制装置.

sentences.en: Normally that situation would put a damper on demand.
sentences.cn: 通常这种情况会降低对债券的需求.

sentences.en: Remove vibration damper ( refer to vibration damper removal in this section ).
sentences.cn: 拆卸减震器 ( 请参阅本节中的减震器拆卸 ).

sentences.en: Remove vibration damper bolt and washer from end of crankshaft.
sentences.cn: 从曲轴端拆下减震器螺栓和垫圈.

sentences.en: Spacious and comfortable cab on high quality rubber damper.
sentences.cn: 驾驶室宽敞舒适,采用优质橡胶元件减振.

sentences.en: The lush vegetation spoke of a damper climate here.
sentences.cn: 茂盛的植物说明这里的气候是潮湿的.

sentences.en: The method of crankshaft vibration damper property and reliability experiments are discussed.
sentences.cn: 就曲轴扭振减振器的性能和疲劳试验的测试方法作相关探讨.

sentences.en: The spikes are believed to be caused by an electrical malfunction; the thud is thought, at least by some, to be just a ventilator damper.
sentences.cn: 操作员们认为仪表显示峰值只是因为电气故障，而巨响被认为是通风阻尼器所发出的声音，至少有一部分人这么认为。

sentences.en: Their argument put a bit of a damper on the party.
sentences.cn: 他们的争论使聚会颇为扫兴.

sentences.en: Tuned mass damper is an effective passive control device.
sentences.cn: 调谐质量阻尼器是一种有效的被动控制装置.

sentences.en: Yu - fan of the single inhalation, D - drive, with the overall stent damper structure.
sentences.cn: 该 毓 风机为单吸人, D 式 传动, 整体支架带减振器结构.

words.tran_cn: 令人扫兴的人；[航][电子][机] 阻尼器（等于damper）
使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制
[航][电子][机]阻尼器；[车辆]减震器；气闸

phrases.tran_cn: 挡板控制；风门控制装置
黏性减振器，黏性阻尼器；粘性阻尼器

trans.tran_cn: （钢琴的）制音器，减震器，（火炉等的）风门，使人扫兴的人（事）
trans.tran_en: a type of small metal door that is opened or closed in a  stove  or  furnace  , to control the air reaching the fire so that it burns more or less strongly
